hours_text:
# Visit

  * 

## We are the San José Museum of Art 

**Have we met?** We are an art museum that nurtures empathy and connection by engaging communities with socially relevant contemporary art. With every visit, you’ll see exhibitions that explore the art of our time through painting, sculpture, film, and new media—there’s something for everyone!

## Hours

### Museum + Store

Thursday: 4–9pm  
Friday: 11am–9pm  
Saturday–Sunday: 11am–6pm

### Museum Café

Thursday: 4–9pm  
Friday: 11am–9pm  
Saturday–Sunday: 11am–3pm

An admission ticket is not required to visit the Museum Store or café.

## Admission

### Tickets

  * Adult, $20
  * Senior 65 and over, $15

Visit the [specials page](https://sjmusart.org/specials) for offers and discounts

### Free Individual Tickets

  * Youth 17 and under
  * College student + teacher with ID

**Bringing a group of 10 or more?**

  * [Book a private group visit](https://outlook.office365.com/owa/calendar/GroupBookings20@sjmusart.org/bookings/s/Zg-XUpFWqkyGrm5kssPC4w2)

  * [Book a college group visit](https://outlook.office365.com/book/GroupBookings20@sjmusart.org/s/pb7kZOHGI0KI8trRpET0Qg2)

### Free Unlimited Visits

  * Museum members

Our members receive FREE unlimited entry for a year, plus much more—[Join us today!](https://sjmusart.org/membership)

[Order admission tickets](https://52102.blackbaudhosting.com/52102/tickets?tab=3&txobjid=1b87ef14-b89d-4a5c-803f-79124cc2bcd8)

## Plan Your Visit

admission_text:
#  Admission

**Admission Tickets**

  * Admission tickets are redeemable anytime on Thursday 4–9pm, Friday 11am–9pm, and Saturday through Sunday, 11am–6pm.
  * Admission includes all museum galleries, special exhibitions during regular hours, and select public programs.
  * Public programs and special events with an additional fee are not included.

**Free Admission Tickets**

  * SJMA is pleased to offer free __ individual admission for youth 17 and under, college students and teachers with valid ID.

**Bringing a group of 10 or more?**

  * Any group of 10 or more is considered a Group Tour. Please email us to schedule an appointment at [education@sjmusart.org.](mailto:education@sjmusart.org)

**SJMA Members****:****** Please **Sign in** on the top right before beginning your order to receive your membership discount at check out. Thank you.

accessibility_text:
# Accessibility

## General information on physical access at SJMA

### Parking

The Museum does not have a parking facility; however, there is one accessible parking spot on Market Street near the Museum’s main entrance. A disabled parking placard is required.

[Preview the accessible parking spot](https://maps.app.goo.gl/yXEVUk1BnE5Wuaok9) using Google Map’s Street View.

### Wheelchair Ramp

The wheelchair ramp is located on the far right of the building's façade (past the end of the large red banner with the Museum’s logo).

[Preview the ramp](https://maps.app.goo.gl/AY71kkfcW5kqL1AU8) using Google Map's Street View.

**Notice:** For the duration of Downtown Ice, the wheelchair ramp can be accessed by going around the perimeter of the fenced rink; or through a walkway from W San Fernando Street (between the 50 West building and the Fairview Plaza Parking Garage ramp).

The Museum is also wheelchair accessible inside with an elevator connect all three floors.

### Accessible Restrooms

Accessible restrooms are located on the first floor, across from the cafe. Additional accessible restrooms are available on the lower level.

### Elevators

A central elevator connects to all three Museum floors.

### For the galleries

Manual and motorized wheelchairs, walkers, canes, and assistive devices are always permitted in the galleries. 

Available upon request at the Admissions Desk or with staff in the galleries:****

Benches are available in most galleries. Additionally, the foll...
